channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Bright Eyes Share New “A Song To Pass The Time” Recording For Today’s 25th Anniversary Of Fever And Mirrors
item.description: Bright Eyes bringing the nostalgia with a special recording for Fever and Mirrors' 25th anniversary 🎶✨ #MusicMilestones #BrightEyesRevival

item.title: ZZ Top Welcome Back Drummer Frank Beard for 2025 Summer North American Tour
item.description: 🎸 The bearded legends are back! 🤘 Don't miss ZZ Top rocking out with Frank Beard on their 2025 tour! 🔥 #ZZTop #RockAndRollRevival

item.title: Magnolia Electric Co. Members & Will Johnson Reunite For New Single, Tour
item.description: 🎶 Reunited and it feels so good! Magnolia Electric Co. members & Will Johnson team up for a new single and tour! 🎸 #MusicNewsUVibe

item.title: Shawn Mendes Announces 2025 “On The Road Again” Tour: How to Get Tickets
item.description: 🎸 Shawn Mendes is hitting the road in 2025! Start practicing your singing for the ultimate concert experience! 🌟 #ShawnMendes #OnTheRoadAgain

item.title: Goo Goo Dolls Played Demi Lovato’s Favorite Song ‘Iris’ at Her Wedding
item.description: Love is in the air! 🎶 @googoodolls serenade @ddlovato with 'Iris' at her wedding. Talk about a fairy-tale moment! 💖 #musicnews
